application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted Details of ventilation strategy pursuant to condition 37 of planning permission ref: 224773FUL dated 18/12/2023, are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply London Plan 2021 the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy 2012 and the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document 2013.
description: Details of ventilation strategy pursuant to condition 37 of planning permission ref: 224773FUL dated 18/12/2023 for: Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment of the site to provide up to 102 dwellings (Use Class C3) in a building of up to 15 storeys with associated landscaping, car and cycle parking
